text: intent: continue improve-web work — implement live-feed placeholder, session collapse, tool call UX improvements in response to web agent feedback

outcome: 9 more web UX features shipped — live-feed placeholder, session list collapse (5+older), settings light-mode checkbox, extended _tool_summary, session stats header, / search shortcut, scroll-to-top button, agent links from agent-* nodes, tool results inside .tool-call with ▶/▼ toggle via _tog()
gotcha: tool result was placed AFTER .tool-call div (not inside), so results were hidden when tool group collapsed — web agent couldn't find them; fixed by moving result_html inside .tool-call
